column3:
Here begins the story of the life of Tim. Tim's father was Frank. Frank's father was
ewlineJim. Jim's father was Greg. And Greg's father was Mark. These 5 men had ruled Markton for
ewlinethe last 100 years. For the last 20 years, Tim had been the ruler. When Frank died, Tim
ewlinebecame the ruler. In these last 20 years, Tim brought lots of good luck to his
ewlinepeople. They had never eaten so well. Most of his people ate 3 meals a day. Recently, Tim
ewlinehad been having trouble with a band of troublemakers led by Horace. Tim chose to do
ewlinewhatever he could to get rid of Horace. So, he got Assassin to get rid of Horace. One
ewlinenight Assassin sneaked into Horace's bedroom and did away with him. With the bad man gone,
ewlineall the people had a giant party and sang a song about the greatness of their ruler.
column4: multiple: Who did the people sing about?
column14: one: How many years has Tim ruled?
